alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 1:29PM CST until December 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 1 PM CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
